title: Fiber in art = Fibre in art
creator_credit: Paul Burnford and Paul Burnford Film Productions
brief_description: Part of the “Materials in art” series. Shows the use of fibre in knotting, stitchery and weaving using a variety of simple looms. Demonstrates an array of techniques that can be used in the classroom. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
